sn21.3:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn21.3:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno rājagahe viharanti veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe ekavihāre.
sn21.3:1.4: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn21.3:1.5: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
sn21.3:2.2: parisuddho mukhavaṇṇo pariyodāto santena nūnāyasmā mahāmoggallāno ajja vihārena vihāsī”ti.
sn21.3:2.4: Api ca me ahosi dhammī kathā”ti.
sn21.3:2.5: “Kena saddhiṁ panāyasmato mahāmoggallānassa ahosi dhammī kathā”ti?
sn21.3:2.6: “Bhagavatā kho me, āvuso, saddhiṁ ahosi dhammī kathā”ti.
sn21.3:2.7: “Dūre kho, āvuso, bhagavā etarahi sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn21.3:2.8: Kiṁ nu kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṁ iddhiyā upasaṅkami;
sn21.3:2.9: udāhu bhagavā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ iddhiyā upasaṅkamī”ti?
sn21.3:2.12: Api ca me yāvatā bhagavā ettāvatā dibbacakkhu visujjhi dibbā ca sotadhātu.
sn21.3:2.13: Bhagavatopi yāvatāhaṁ ettāvatā dibbacakkhu visujjhi dibbā ca sotadhātū”ti.
sn21.3:2.14: “Yathākathaṁ panāyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhagavatā saddhiṁ ahosi dhammī kathā”ti?
sn21.3:3.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, āraddhavīriyo hotī’ti?
sn21.3:3.4: Evaṁ vutte, maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā etadavoca:
sn21.3:3.6: kāmaṁ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, sarīre upassussatu maṁsalohitaṁ, yaṁ taṁ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṁ na taṁ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṁ bhavissatīti.
sn21.3:3.8: Evaṁ kho me, āvuso, bhagavatā saddhiṁ ahosi dhammī kathā”ti.
sn21.3:4.1: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, himavato pabbatarājassa parittā pāsāṇasakkharā yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya;
sn21.3:4.2: evameva kho mayaṁ āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya.
sn21.3:4.3: Āyasmā hi mahāmoggallāno mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo ākaṅkhamāno kappaṁ tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
sn21.3:5.1: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, mahatiyā loṇaghaṭāya parittā loṇasakkharāya yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya;
sn21.3:5.2: evameva kho mayaṁ āyasmato sāriputtassa yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya.
sn21.3:5.3: Āyasmā hi sāriputto bhagavatā anekapariyāyena thomito vaṇṇito pasattho:
sn21.3:7.1: Itiha te ubho mahānāgā aññamaññassa subhāsitaṁ sulapitaṁ samanumodiṁsūti.
